title: Closure Call: Did He End Their FWB Situation Because He Wants More?
description:
What do you do when dreamy Mr. Perfect totally sweeps you off your feet, there’s a connection, then he disappears? If you broke up or he ghosted you, but you’re still not exactly sure why…you need a Closure Call!
They had a nice “friends with benefits” situation going on for a couple of months, and then he abruptly ghosted her! If things were going so well, then why would he ditch her? We reached out to him for answers. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
